templateOptions.label: ApiID
templateOptions.description: The API-ID is the unique name for the API to identify it's purpose

templateOptions.label: APIToken
templateOptions.description: The API Token used to authenticate against Iris Intranet. This must be retrieved from within the application.

templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to connect to Iris Intranet. [https://mycompany.irisintranet.com]
